body.p: To his excelancy B. Magoffin Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky your Petitioners would respectfully represent to Your excelancy that Two young men. or Boys from This Wolfe County was sentenced to the penitentiary For some length of time from Campbell County Kentucky for attempting to pass counterfeit Money and your Petitioners will represent that Nicholass Fulks & Harrison Brown are Boys well Respected at home and all ways was untill They ware decoyd off by a notorious man who has been suspected of counterfeiting for years And your Petitioners would futhr represent that The said Fulks & Brown are the sons of Two Widow women who are poore and allmsot unable to support themselves Since, their sons left home and your petitioners would and do petition your Excencly to Pardon the Two Boys that they may come Home and support there old widowed mother ^Little^ brother & Sisters and your petitioners will forever petition Your Excelency to represent the said boys and untill they are repreived your Petition will petition your excencly B. Magoffin Govenor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
Given under our hands this 30th day of July 1861
